title: Deep learning-based diagnosis and survival prediction of patients with renal cell carcinoma from primary whole slide images
details: S Chen, X Wang, J Zhang, L Jiang, F Gao, J Xiang… - Pathology, 2024
abstract: It remains an urgent clinical demand to explore novel diagnostic and prognostic biomarkers for renal cell carcinoma (RCC). We proposed deep learning-based artificial intelligence strategies. The study included 1752 whole slide images from …

title: CXR-Agent: Vision-language models for chest X-ray interpretation with uncertainty aware radiology reporting
abstract: Recently large vision-language models have shown potential when interpreting complex images and generating natural language descriptions using advanced reasoning. Medicine's inherently multimodal nature incorporating scans and text …
